response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that I believe could significantly impact your life or business. Given its significance, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is a chance to secure a piece that might be difficult to find elsewhere, and I am confident it will add substantial value to your collection or endeavors. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1200000}
